General.Name: BLD Plantation Bhd
General.Description: BLD Plantation Bhd., an investment holding company, engages in palm oil business in Malaysia, Bangladesh, China, India, Korea, Africa, and internationally. The company operates through Oil Palm Operations and Investment holding segments. Its activities include cultivation of oil palm; operation of a palm oil refinery and kernel crushing plant; processing of fresh fruit bunches and sale of related products; letting of property; provision of management services; and operation of a stone quarry. In addition, the company engages in the integrated cattle farming and goat rearing activities, as well as offers compost and security services. BLD Plantation Bhd. was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Kuching, Malaysia.
